yogas.name: Gajakesari Yoga
yogas.condition: Jupiter is in a Kendra (1, 4, 7, 10) from Moon.
yogas.result: Grants wisdom, wealth, and a virtuous reputation. You will be capable of overpowering enemies and rising to high positions.

yogas.name: Budhaditya Yoga
yogas.condition: Sun and Mercury are conjoined in the same house.
yogas.result: Creates high intelligence, skill in administration, and good reputation in professional life.

yogas.name: Dhana Yoga (2-11 Connection)
yogas.condition: Lords of 2nd and 11th houses are connected.
yogas.result: Indicates immense wealth accumulation and multiple sources of income throughout life.

yogas.name: Pancha Mahapurusha (Hamsa)
yogas.condition: Jupiter in own sign or exalted in a Kendra house.
yogas.result: Makes the person religious, highly respected, and pure in heart. Success in education or law.

Moon.1: Emotional sensitivity, fluctuating moods, caring nature.
Moon.4: Happiness from mother, vehicles, and home.

Saturn.10: Hard work leads to high status. Success comes late but stays.
Saturn.7: Delayed marriage or mature partner. Dutiful relationships.
